SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CoreModulesOptionsValue] ( [CoreModulesOptionsValue_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CoreModulesOptions_Code] varchar(200) NULL , [CoreModulesOptionsValue_Value] varchar(MAX) NOT NULL , [CoreModulesOptionsValue_UserInsert] int NULL , [CoreModulesOptionsValue_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CoreModulesOptionsValue_UserDelete] int NULL , [CoreModulesOptionsValue_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CoreModulesOptionsValue_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CoreModulesOptionsValue_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CoreModulesOptionsValue] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CoreModulesOptionsValue PRIMARY KEY ([CoreModulesOptionsValue_Ky])
